project.description: Yocto sumo internal build to iron out build issues with new commits

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -x -e
cat > site.conf <<EOF BB_GIT_SHALLOW ?= "1" BB_GIT_SHALLOW_DEPTH ?= "1" # Usage in a recipe with multiple named uris or multiple named branches BB_GIT_SHALLOW_DEPTH_doc = ""
# u-boot-edm.bb SRCSERVER_pn-u-boot-edm = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/uboot-imx-edm.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-u-boot-edm = "tn-imx_v2018.03_4.14.98_2.0.0_ga-wip" SRCOPTIONS_pn-u-boot-edm = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-u-boot-edm = "\${AUTOREV}" SRC_URI_pn-u-boot-edm = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
# u-boot-script.bb #SRCSERVER_pn-u-boot-script = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/uboot-imx-edm.git" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-u-boot-script = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw"
# linux-firmware-brcm-tn.bb SRCSERVER_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/brcm_firmware.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "master" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "317394ca84258e4f11a138014820eebf0c43db1e" SRC_URI_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" S_pn-linux-firmware-brcm-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# linux-firmware-qca-tn.bb SRCSERVER_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/qca_firmware.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "caf-wlan/CNSS.LEA.NRT_3.0" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "e095f250346d337d91eacc95393f21e3e58140e2" SRC_URI_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" S_pn-linux-firmware-qca-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# linux-tn-imx.bb SRCSERVER_pn-linux-tn-imx = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/tn-kernel.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-linux-tn-imx = "tn-imx_4.14.98_2.0.0_ga-wip" SRCOPTIONS_pn-linux-tn-imx = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-linux-tn-imx = "\${AUTOREV}" SRC_URI_pn-linux-tn-imx = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" # Remove the upstream history from our kernel repo, keeping our own BB_GIT_SHALLOW_REVS_pn-linux-tn-imx = "\${AUTOREV}" BB_GIT_SHALLOW_DEPTH_pn-linux-tn-imx = "" # Keep the branches in linux-tn-imx repositories BB_GIT_SHALLOW_TRIM_REFS_pn-linux-tn-imx = "0"
# kernel-module-qcacld-tn.bb SRCSERVER_pn-kernel-module-qcacld-tn = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm/qcacld-2.0.git" SRCBRANCH_pn-kernel-module-qcacld-tn = "tn-CNSS.LEA.NRT_3.0" SRCOPTIONS_pn-kernel-module-qcacld-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" SRCREV_pn-kernel-module-qcacld-tn = "\${AUTOREV}" #"e095f250346d337d91eacc95393f21e3e58140e2" SRC_URI_pn-kernel-module-qcacld-tn = "\${SRCSERVER};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" #EXTRA_OEMAKE_append_pn-kernel-module-qcacld-tn = " CONFIG_P2P_INTERFACE=y" #S_pn-kernel-module-qcacld-tn = "\${WORKDIR}/git"
# afloader.bb #TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR_pn-afloader = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/fpga/afloader.git" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-afloader = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRC_URI_pn-afloader = "\${TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}" SRCREV_pn-afloader = "87814f59c55002ec388d5a508d10300bf5b8d140"
# axonfabric-firmware.bb #TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR_pn-axonfabric-firmware = "git://10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/fpga/axonfabric-firmware.git" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-axonfabric-firmware = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRC_URI_pn-axonfabric-firmware = "\${TECHNEXION_GITHUB_MIRROR};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
# imx-m4-demos-tn.bb #SRCREV_pn-imx-m4-demos-tn = "d10b8dab12d6a34d79beae536ade455e6bbaacf2" #M4_SRC_pn-imx-m4-demos-tn = "git://10.20.30.20:/volume1/internal_git/edm/imx-m4-demos-tn.git" #SRCOPTIONS_pn-imx-m4-demos-tn = ";protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRC_URI_pn-imx-m4-demos-tn = "\${M4_SRC};branch=\${SRCBRANCH}\${SRCOPTIONS}"
#GST1.0-PLUGINS-GOOD_SRC_pn-gstreamer1.0-plugins-good = "gitsm://10.88.88.8/volume1/external/imx/gst-plugins-good.git;protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRCREV_pn-gstreamer1.0-plugins-good = "bed7132deff7769a5bb929eae02e7fee3b4e8c6d" #GST1.0-PLUGINS-BAD_SRC_pn-gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad = "gitsm://10.88.88.8/volume1/external/imx/gst-plugins-bad.git;protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRCREV_pn-gstreamer1.0-plugins-bad = "249fb31cf445b31411dfc5deaee457ab7667114f" #GST1.0-PLUGINS-BASE_SRC_pn-gstreamer1.0-plugins-base = "gitsm://10.88.88.8/volume1/external/imx/gst-plugins-base.git;protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRCREV_pn-gstreamer1.0-plugins-base = "63552e1d854ce658eb1fd5039f65a503ed98929c" #GST1.0_SRC_pn-gstreamer1.0 = "gitsm://10.88.88.8/volume1/external/imx/gstreamer.git;protocol=ssh;user=rdsw" #SRCREV_pn-gstreamer1.0 = "f6f3ac8722c4fb6888ed0eee89946db3fceeac1d"
EOF
cat > local_manifest.xml <<EOF <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <manifest> <remote name="internal" fetch="ssh://rdsw@10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm" />
<remove-project name="meta-tn-imx-bsp" /> <project name="meta-tn-imx-bsp" remote="internal" path="sources/meta-tn-imx-bsp" revision="sumo_4.14.98-2.0.0_GA-next" > <linkfile src="tools/edm-setup-release.sh" dest="edm-setup-release.sh"/> <linkfile src="tools/setup-environment.sh" dest="setup-environment"/> <linkfile src="README" dest="README-TechNexion-BSP"/> </project> </manifest> EOF

#!/bin/bash -x -e
MANUSCRIPT=imx-4.14.98-2.0.1_patch.xml
GITSERVER="10.20.30.20" KERNELSRV="10.88.88.8" chmod 0600 ~/.ssh/id_rsa ssh-keyscan ${GITSERVER} >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts ssh-keyscan ${KERNELSRV} >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts
# initialize technexion github yocto repository echo ===== Repo init yocto from TechNexion github ===== ${HOME}/bin/repo init -u https://github.com/TechNexion/tn-imx-yocto-manifest.git -b sumo_4.14.y_GA-next -m $MANUSCRIPT #${HOME}/bin/repo init -u ssh://rdsw@${GITSERVER}/volume1/internal_git/edm/edm-yocto-bsp.git -b sumo-4.14.y_GA -m $MANUSCRIPT
mkdir -p .repo/local_manifests/ cp local_manifest.xml .repo/local_manifests/ #sed -e "s,https://github.com/TechNexion,ssh://rdsw@10.20.30.20/volume1/internal_git/edm,g" -i .repo/manifest.xml #cat .repo/manifest.xml
echo ===== Repo sync yocto from TechNexion github ===== rm -fr $WORKSPACE/sources/meta-tn-imx-bsp ${HOME}/bin/repo sync --force-sync
# Update EULA Agreement Acceptance Config and Create the setup-envronment scripts echo ===== Update EULA Agreement Acceptance Config and Create the setup-envronment scripts ===== sed -i ':a;N;$!ba;s/EULA_ACCEPTED=\n/echo "ACCEPT_FSL_EULA = \\"1\\"" >> conf\/local.conf\n/' sources/base/setup-environment

#!/bin/bash -x -e
DLDIR=/home/jenkins/workspace/src/yocto2.5/downloads SSTATEDIR=/home/jenkins/workspace/src/yocto2.5/sstate-cache
SOMs=("pico-imx6ul" "pico-imx6" "pico-imx7" "edm-imx6" "edm-imx7" "tep1-imx7" "tek-imx6" "axon-imx6" "pico-imx8mq" "pico-imx8mm" "edm-imx8mq" "flex-imx8mm" "xore-imx8mm" "axon-imx8mm") #DISTROs=("xwayland") # "x11") # "fb" "wayland") TGTIMGTYPEs=("fsl-image-qt5-validation-imx") # tn-image-test" "fsl-image-validation-imx" "core-image-minimal" "core-image-base" "core-image-sato" "fsl-image-machine-test")
# setup environment variables for building # BASEBOARDs=("pi" "nymph" "dwarf" "hobbit") # DISPLAYs=("lvds7" "hdmi720p" "hdmi1080p" "lcd" "lvds7_hdmi720p") # WLANs=("qca" "brcm" "ath-pci") setup_env_vars () { case $1 in pico-imx8mq) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" distro="xwayland" nfc="nfc" ;; pico-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" distro="xwayland" nfc="nfc" ;; edm-imx8mq) board="wizard" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" distro="xwayland" ;; flex-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" distro="xwayland" ;; axon-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" distro="xwayland" ;; xore-imx8mm) board="pi" disp="mipi5" wlan="qca" pan="ili9881c" distro="xwayland" ;; pico-imx6) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca brcm" pan="" distro="x11" ;; pico-imx7) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca brcm" pan="" distro="x11" ;; pico-imx6ul) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca brcm" pan="" distro="x11" ;; edm-imx6) board="fairy" disp="lvds7" wlan="qca brcm" pan="" distro="x11" ;; axon-imx6) board="pi" disp="lcd" wlan="qca brcm" pan="" distro="x11" ;; edm-imx7) board="gnome" disp="lcd" wlan="qca brcm" pan="" distro="x11" ;; tep1-imx7) disp="lcd" wlan="ath-pci" pan="" distro="x11" ;; tep1-imx6ul) board="gnome" disp="lcd" wlan="ath-pci" pan="" distro="x11" ;; tek-imx6) board="tek" disp="lvds10" wlan="ath-pci" pan="" distro="x11" ;; tek3-imx6ul) board="tek" disp="lvds10" wlan="ath-pci" pan="" distro="x11" ;; *) ;; esac }
# Loop each som distro image_type and configs for som in ${SOMs[*]}; do # building the yocto with preset config params echo "===== Building SOM:$som DISTRO:fsl-imx-$distro TARGET:$target ====="
# go to workspace for next build cd ${WORKSPACE}
# Set up the build environment variables setup_env_vars $som echo "===== WLAN:$wlan DISPLAY:$disp BASEBOARD:$board PANEL:$pan ====="
# setup yocto build environment MACHINE=$som DISTRO=fsl-imx-$distro WIFI_FIRMWARE=all WIFI_MODULE=$wlan DISPLAY=$disp BASEBOARD=$board PANEL=$pan source edm-setup-release.sh -b build-$som || :
# get current build dir and check if local.conf exists BUILD_DIR=. if [ ! -e $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf ]; then echo -e "\n ERROR - No build directory is set yet. Run the 'setup-environment' script before running this script to create " $BUILD_DIR "\n" return 1 else # set the download directory [ -d ${DLDIR} ] || mkdir -p ${DLDIR} [ -d ${SSTATEDIR} ] || mkdir -p ${SSTATEDIR} # setup conf/local.conf if grep "^DL_DIR.*" $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf > /dev/null ; then sed -e 's|^DL_DIR.*|DL_DIR = "'$DLDIR'"|g' -i $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf else echo "DL_DIR = \"$DLDIR\"" >> $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf fi if grep "^SSTATE_DIR.*" $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf > /dev/null ; then sed -e 's|^SSTATE_DIR.*|SSTATE_DIR = "'$SSTATEDIR'"|g' -i $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf else echo "SSTATE_DIR = \"$SSTATEDIR\"" >> $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf fi echo "INHERIT += \"rm_work\"" >> $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf # jenkin build modification #echo "BOOT_SPACE_mx6 = \"16384\"" >> $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf #echo "BOOT_SPACE_mx7 = \"16384\"" >> $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf fi
if [ "$som" = "pico-imx8mq" ]; then # additional NFC to pico-imx8mq build export NFC=${nfc} export BB_ENV_EXTRAWHITE="$BB_ENV_EXTRAWHITE NFC" fi
if [ "$som" = "pico-imx8mm" ]; then # additional NFC to pico-imx8mm build export NFC=${nfc} export BB_ENV_EXTRAWHITE="$BB_ENV_EXTRAWHITE NFC" fi
# copy the site.conf from ${workspace} for internal git fetch cp $WORKSPACE/site.conf $BUILD_DIR/conf/site.conf
# export of the conf and bitbake environment settings cat $BUILD_DIR/conf/site.conf cat $BUILD_DIR/conf/local.conf cat $BUILD_DIR/conf/bblayers.conf export
bitbake u-boot-edm -c cleansstate bitbake linux-tn-imx -c cleansstate # build both fsl-image-validation-imx, fsl-image-qt5-validation-imx images for target in ${TGTIMGTYPEs[*]}; do # Compile using bitbake bitbake $target -c cleanall bitbake $target -e | grep ^OVERRIDES bitbake $target done done
